column4: The number of institutions represented in that column of data.  This number is used primarily for peer group data.

This includes all other operating expenses of the institution. These may consist of net (gains) or losses on OREO, loans sales, fixed assets sales, amortization of intangible assets, or other itemized expenses. Beginning in June 1996, this does not include losses on asset sales for TFR reporters. Such gains (losses) are included net in noninterest income. RIS definition:  YR - IDEOTH = EOTHNINT + EAMINTAN (>2000) or IDEOTH=EOTHNINT QTR - IDOTHNIQ = NONIIQ - SUM(IFIDUCQ, ISERCHGQ, IGLTRDQ)

column2: Goodwill Impairment Losses and Amortization Expense
column4: Goodwill impairment losses and amortization expense and impairment loss for other intangible assets on a consolidated basis

column2: Amortization Expense and Impairment Losses for Other intangible Losses
column4: Amortization expense and impairment losses for other intangible assets. This item is not available for TFR Reporters.TFR reports ended December 2011.
Goodwill impairment losses. This item is not available for TFR Reporters.TFR reports ended December 2011.

All other noninterest expense on a consolidated basis. May include:  Data processing expenses,  Advertising and marketing expenses,  Directors’ fees,  Printing, stationery, and supplies,  Postage, Legal fees and expenses, FDIC deposit insurance assessments, Expenses related to the testing and training of officers and employees,  Accounting and auditing expenses, Consulting and advisory expenses, Automated teller machine (ATM) and interchange expenses, and  Telecommunications expenses.  For Call Reporters   prior to March 2001, it includes the amortization of intangible assets. It does not include losses on asset sales for TFR Reporters  .beginning in June 1996; such gains (losses) are includednet in noninterest income.
